Investing in Health, Empowering Growth

Latticework is a growth-oriented private equity firm with over $650 million of assets under management, focused on control equity investments in lower-middle market healthcare companies that exhibit transformational characteristics.

Learn More About Latticework
OUR EXPERIENCE
Healthcare Portfolio

Our team excels in deal sourcing, strategic planning, value creation, executive recruiting, acquisition planning, and board governance. We have an established track record of investing in a diverse range of healthcare businesses, including providers, pharmaceutical services, medical component and equipment manufacturers, and healthcare-related business service companies. With broad industry experience and a hands-on approach, we are committed to fostering innovation and growth in the companies we partner with.

Explore Our Portfolio Companies

ABOUT
APPROACH
INVESTMENTS
NEWS
CONTACT
INVESTOR LOGIN
We are a growth oriented private equity firm focused exclusively on the healthcare industry

In the competitive world of private equity, fund specialization is essential. The healthcare industry’s complex and evolving landscape demands expertise to achieve exceptional returns. At Latticework Capital Management, we navigate this intricate sector with precision and insight.

Our team has a tested track record, having completed over 141 transactions since our founding across diverse healthcare subsectors, including providers, pharmaceutical services, medical equipment manufacturers, and healthcare-related business services. Each subsector presents unique challenges and opportunities, which we address with our specialized knowledge and strategic approach.

We stay ahead of industry trends, regulatory changes, and technological advancements to maintain our competitive edge. By fostering strong partnerships and delivering strategic insights, we empower our portfolio companies to thrive.

Our focus on healthcare is about more than financial returns; it’s about making a meaningful impact. We invest in businesses pioneering new treatments, improving patient care, and advancing healthcare delivery, shaping the future of healthcare and creating lasting value for our investors and partners.

Over 110+ years of combined investing experience in healthcare and private equity.

Learn More About Our Team

How We Work With Our Partners

At Latticework, our approach is collaborative and hands-on. We partner with healthcare companies, providing not just capital but also strategic guidance and industry expertise. Our team works closely with portfolio companies to identify opportunities, develop growth strategies, and execute plans that drive measurable results.

View All Portfolio Companies

Unlock your business potential with Latticework.

base_content.content:
MEET THE TEAM
At Latticework, our greatest asset is our team. Comprised of industry experts and seasoned professionals, our team brings a wealth of experience and a diverse range of skills to the table.

You can help Build a Better Tomorrow with Latticework
We’re always on the lookout for passionate, talented individuals to join our dynamic team. Even if there aren’t current openings listed, we’d love to hear from you.

Reach out to us and let’s discuss how you can be a part of our journey to drive innovation and excellence.

The Latticework advantage, a strategic partnership for growth
Experienced Healthcare
Investors
Buy and Build
Strategy
Aligned Incentives
with Management
Provide Management with
Value Added Resources
Experienced Healthcare Investors

With a focus solely on the healthcare industry, our team has a wealth of experience across various subsectors, including providers, medical equipment, business services, and pharmaceutical services. Since 2015, we have built and scaled companies across the healthcare ecosystem through diverse economic cycles, completing over 141 acquisitions and 44 de novo expansions.

Value Creation Plan

The Value Creation Plan (“VCP”) is created before closing to develop strategic and tactical alignment with management in order to build the company with a shared vision.

Addition of talent to augment leadership (as needed) and fill any gaps in the team structure
Use of Board members and operating partners for strategic and tactical execution
Continual focus on exit strategy
Enhance operations, with emphasis on data driven decision making
Identification of organic growth potential, with a specific focus on deeper penetration of existing customers and geographies, diversification of products and services, expanding sales and marketing, and new geographic expansion
The Mutual Expectations Pact between Latticework Capital Management and the management team establishes a clear understanding of roles and responsibilities post-investment.

We focus on cultivating a strategic board of directors, managing lender relations, overseeing acquisition processes, and planning for exits. The management team handles day-to-day operations, business development, and overall management. Both parties collaborate closely on strategy development, reporting, communication, recruiting, and succession planning. This ongoing partnership includes regular communication with CEOs and CFOs, facility visits, strategic discussions, and comprehensive reporting on key performance indicators, budgeting, and financial forecasting. This collaborative approach ensures alignment and maximizes the potential for shared success.

Cultivate Strategic BOD
Lender Relations
Acquisition Processing
Exit Planning

Strategy Development
Reporting & Communications
Recruiting
Succession Planning

Day-to-Day Management

A Distinctive Approach to Healthcare Investing

At Latticework Capital Management, we don’t just invest in companies—we partner with visionary leaders to drive transformative growth in the healthcare sector. Our differentiated approach, deep expertise, and established track record set us apart in the competitive landscape of private equity.

Partner With Latticework

Choosing Latticework Capital Management means choosing a partner committed to your company’s growth and success. With our focused expertise, strategic approach, and extensive experience, we are uniquely positioned to help healthcare companies scale and transform.

Investment Criteria

The Latticework team has extensive experience in building companies across the healthcare ecosystem. We seek to partner with and build companies that have the ability to exceed industry growth creating significant value for its investments and management partners.

Prior Investments
ACCELLENT

Provider of outsourced precision manufacturing and engineering services to the medical device industry.

ATI PHYSICAL THERAPY
Comprehensive orthopedic rehabilitation provider that incorporates the most effective elements of physical therapy, exercise physiology, and athletic training.
CAMBRIDGE MAJOR LABORATORIES / AAI PHARMA
Leading pharmaceutical contract development and manufacturing organization.
CHRONIC CARE SOLUTIONS
Provider of quality, branded healthcare products and disease management services predominantly serving diabetic patients.
HOME SOLUTIONS
Home infusion provider offering acute and chronic infusion services to patients in the home setting.
LIBERTY DIALYSIS
Dialysis services company providing dialysis to patients who have been diagnosed with end-stage renal disease
MEADOWS BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE

Behavioral health treatment provider for trauma and people struggling with addiction, eating disorders and related mental health conditions.

SCIVEX
Manufacturer of micro and nano-scale fluidics componentry.
SCIENTIFIC PROTEIN LABORATORIES
Manufacturer and supplier of heparin and pancreatin active pharmaceutical ingredients (API).
TRINITY HOSPICE
Hospice care provider.
VALUE PLASTICS
Designer and manufacturer of plastic, disposable fluid connectors.

* “Prior Investments” represent investments made by firms at which Kyle Bradford and Steve Neumann, Latticework Capital Management’s Founders (“LCM’s Founders”) were employed prior to the founding of Latticework. While LCM’s Founders were responsible for these investments, all such investments were supported by other personnel at these firms, some of whom held positions senior to LCM’s Founders, including the members of the respective firm’s investment committee who will not be members of Latticework’s investment committee or otherwise employed by Latticework.  Such differences may cause decisions made by LCM’s Founders on behalf of its previous firms to differ materially from decisions Latticework may make on behalf of the funds.

With Experience in
Let’s accelerate your growth together.

At Latticework Capital Management, we bring not just capital, but also expertise, resources, and a collaborative approach to drive transformative success.
